full_summary:
### Government Contract Opportunity

### Solicitation Number: 5P420-23-0016/B
#### **RFP: Air Charter Services in Nunavut**

Parks Canada Agency (PCA) is seeking service providers for air charter services in Nunavut. 

#### **Service Description**

PCA requires air travel services for transporting personnel, materials, and equipment to Nunavut communities for operational purposes. The service provider must be capable of providing:

* Services on an as-and-when-required basis
* Two (2) fixed-wing aircraft capable of landing on gravel runways
* Transportation of up to 12 passengers using one aircraft and up to 8 passengers with the second aircraft
* Ability to transport dangerous goods

#### **Contract Duration**

The contract period is from July 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025, with an option to extend by up to two (2) additional one-year periods until March 31, 2027.

#### **Evaluation Criteria**

Bidder submissions will be evaluated based on:

* Weighted-and-rated Inuit Benefits Criteria (G)
* Nunavut Benefits Criteria (H)
* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price (ISMRC)

#### **Instructions for Bidders**

* Bids must be submitted by fax or email to soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca
* Maximum email file size: 15 megabytes
* Bidders can submit a bid for any or all regions
* Regions include Baffin, Kitikmeot, and Kivalliq with an anticipated number of contracts as follows:

| Region | Nunavut Region | Anticipated # of Contracts |
|  ---  |  ---  |  ---  |
| A     | Baffin         | 1 |
| B     | Kitikmeot      | 1 |
| C     | Kivalliq       | 1 |

#### **Enquiries**

Technical and contractual enquiries should be submitted in writing and and should be received no later than seven (7) calendar days prior to the date set for solicitation closing to allow sufficient time to provide a response.

#### **Contract Award**

The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### **Additional Information**

For further information and clarification, please visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca)

---
